title: Global brands
description: From federal companies to global brands. Visa, Delta, Amway, Mondelez, RaceTrac, and many more across my career.

title: Product thinking
description: Partner, not executor. Formulate hypotheses, connect design to metrics, bridge the gap between Figma and production. Run workshops with dev teams to ship what was designed.

title: AI fluency
description: Use AI across the entire workflow: research, ideation, UX, visuals, prototyping, code. Deep understanding of infrastructure (models, RAG, APIs, MCPs).

title: Design systems
description: Built design systems in Figma for Visa, RaceTrac, Amway, and more. Components, tokens, variables, documentation. Built foundations to scale across teams.

title: AI prototyping and tools
description: Built complex workflows for task management, automation, and rapid prototyping. Always looking to integrate new tech into existing processes—from simple shortcuts to AI pipelines.

title: Strong design foundations
description: Composition, typography, color, form — shaped by years in branding. Featured in Logolounge, Dieline, Packaging of the World. 500+k downloads of my font.

title: Cross-functional collaboration
description: Worked closely with developers and product managers to ensure smooth implementation of design solutions. Facilitated design thinking workshops at major tech conferences.

title: Typography
description: Deep love for type. Created Peace Sans — 500K+ downloads. Typography is the foundation of everything I design.

title: Building apps & tools
description: Love creating internal tools that solve real problems. From task managers to prototyping apps — if it doesn't exist, I build it.
